CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Further fine - tuning of the LUMO and HOMO levels of the polymer by structural modification may improve V OC and promote the utilization of more NIR light by the lower bandgap materials . In conclusion , a highly effective photovoltaic polymer with NIR response , PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) , based on alternating 3,6-dithien-2-yl-2 , 5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione units has been synthesized. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) has high hole mobility ( 0.05 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 ) and broad photocurrent response wavelengths from 300 nm to 1.1 μm. The photovoltaic properties of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) were preliminarily investigated , and high shortcircuit current ( 14.87 mA / cm^2 ) and PCE ( 2.71% ) were achieved. Considering the sufficiently high I SC values of this system , more promising photovoltaic performance is thought to be achievable by using other fullerene derivatives with high LUMO energy levels , such as bis-PCBM 13 or Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH. 14 Further device optimization and the synthesis of new μmRpolymers are currently in progress and will be reported in due course. N-[1- (2-ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]pyrrole and

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)
2. bis-PCBM
3. Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH
4. N-[1- (2-ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]pyrrole

These are the names of the materials mentioned in the paragraph, which are related to the field of photovoltaics and polymer science.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)
2. Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer directly to "Material Name".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name", presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the Property Names of materials in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Further fine - tuning of the LUMO and HOMO levels of the polymer by structural modification may improve V OC and promote the utilization of more NIR light by the lower bandgap materials . In conclusion , a highly effective photovoltaic polymer with NIR response , PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) , based on alternating 3,6-dithien-2-yl-2 , 5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione units has been synthesized. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) has high hole mobility ( 0.05 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 ) and broad photocurrent response wavelengths from 300 nm to 1.1 μm. The photovoltaic properties of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) were preliminarily investigated , and high shortcircuit current ( 14.87 mA / cm^2 ) and PCE ( 2.71% ) were achieved. Considering the sufficiently high I SC values of this system , more promising photovoltaic performance is thought to be achievable by using other fullerene derivatives with high LUMO energy levels , such as bis-PCBM 13 or Lu3N @ C80 - PCBH. 14 Further device optimization and the synthesis of new μmRpolymers are currently in progress and will be reported in due course. N-[1- (2-ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]pyrrole and

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the property names of the materials mentioned in the paragraph:

1. LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) - not specified
2. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) - not specified
3. PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) - a photovoltaic polymer
4. 3,6-dithien-2-yl-2,5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione - a repeating unit in the PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) polymer
5. bis-PCBM (Bis-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester) - a fullerene derivative
6. Lu3N @ C80-PCBH (Lutetium nitride doped with C80-PCBH) - another fullerene derivative
7. N-[1- (2-ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]pyrrole - a repeating unit in the PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) polymer

Note that some of these terms are used as chemical names, while others are used as descriptive terms to characterize the materials' properties.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Property Name of Material.

Of course! Here are the property names of materials mentioned in the paragraph, after removing irrelevant entities:

1. LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital)
2. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital)
3. PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) (a photovoltaic polymer)
4. 3,6-dithien-2-yl-2,5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione (a repeating unit in the PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) polymer)
5. bis-PCBM (Bis-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)
6. Lu3N @ C80-PCBH (Lutetium nitride doped with C80-PCBH)
7. N-[1- (2-ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]pyrrole (a repeating unit in the PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) polymer)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid property names mentioned in the paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) |
| HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) |
| PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) (a photovoltaic polymer) |
| 3,6-dithien-2-yl-2,5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione (a repeating unit in the PDTP-DTDPP(Bu) polymer) |
| bis-PCBM (Bis-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester) |
